QuestData.Title: On Even Ground
QuestData.Description: We're fortunate dat those giants be havin' such bad aim. Luck is sure to be favorin' dem eventually though.$B$BWe need to get dem off da battlefield, but I don't tink takin' dem head on would be very smart.$B$BTake dis grapplin' line, get a good hold on one of their ankles and pull their legs out from under dem. Once dey are on da ground, dey should be easy ta be finishin' off.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Elementium Grapple Line to pull 3 Servants of Therazane off of their feet.
QuestData.RewardText: Dat will slow their assault a bit while Norsala be findin' a way to calm'm. We've no desire ta be remainin' enemies of Therazane the Stonemother.
